title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 678.11 - Assignment of counsel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 678.11 - Assignment of counsel

State Regulations

Assignment of counsel by the Family

Court, Supreme Court or Surrogate's Court to represent indigent adults in
proceedings pursuant to section
262
of the

Family Court Act, shall be made from law guardian panels designated pursuant to

Part 679 of this Title (the rules of the Appellate Division, Second

Department). Attorneys so assigned shall be subject to those court rules
including the rules relating to evaluation and removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
678.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
